author: hikariws
content:
If we consider tx spam as actually flooding tx, as bots flooding the network with tx fighting each other for who commits their tx first, and that all tx are worth if commited, then I'd say the cause is indeed low cost tx and therefore the solution would be increasing tx fee.

Other solutions would be limit the minimum duration an account may submit a tx or only increase tx fee for accounts willing to flood. But all these sorts of solutions may be bypassed by the same user using hundreds of different accounts to fake as hundreds of different users. Then we'd need to throw privacy away to be able to identify when the same user is using multiple accounts.

author: hikariws
content: If we consider tx spam as a bad actor spamming the network for DDOS or the sorts, then the situation is more complex and only higher tx fee would be able to avoid that, I'm afraid.
